description: Gan Fall's private residence and sanctuary in Skypiea. This location is significant because Enel's Mantra cannot reach it, making it a safe haven for those fleeing from the God of Skypiea. Gan Fall uses this home to protect Conis and Pagaya from Enel's surveillance.
significance: A safe haven hidden from Enel's Mantra, representing Gan Fall's ongoing resistance against Enel's tyrannical rule and his commitment to protecting the innocent.

keyEvents.title: Gan Fall Reveals Skypiea History
keyEvents.description: Gan Fall explains the origins of the Sky People-Shandian conflict to Conis and Pagaya while sheltering them at his home.

keyEvents.title: Pirates Visited 20 Years Ago
keyEvents.description: Gan Fall mentions that pirates visited Skypiea twenty years ago and became his friends.
